summary: Huge estate with re-textured exteriors, a lot of new meshes and textures and big attention to detail.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/jkzCMJS.png[/img]
[size=4][u]V2.0 UPDATE MAJOR OVERHAUL! [/u]
- Completely new massive estate interior with every crafting station you need
- 2 completely new interiors
- Exterior has been overhauled and re-textured
- Follower friendly 
- Tons of new meshes and textures for unique feel
[/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/8qhMmJT.png[/img]
[size=4]- Huge main estate with crafting room, dining room, servant's room, kitchen,  player room, personal vault and a terrace etc
- 2 new interiors, merchant ship and guest quarters
- Largely detailed exterior with custom made 2k textures
- A lot of new meshes and textures
- Follower friendly
[/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/UaHJmZf.png[/img]
[size=4]- This mod only requires the base Skyrim game.
- There is no known incompatibilities, but ones that edit surroundings of The Lady Stone are 100% incompatible.[/size]


[size=5][img]https://i.imgur.com/jk37j3k.png[/img][/size]
[size=4]Mods to get near same graphical fidelity as in the pictures.
Reduces FPS substantially, recommended for high-spec computers only!
Remember to check for any required patches!

[/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim 2K Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242/?]Purity[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]Realvision ENB Full[/url]
[/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url]
[/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]
[/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52612/?]Real Shelter[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64941/?]Wonders of Weather[/url][/size]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/eFlmLmg.png[/img]
[size=4]Q: Location pls?
A: Lake Ilinalta, South-West of Riverwood.
[/size]
[size=4]Q: How do I open the gate?
A: You can find the key to the estate at Ilinaltas Deep, second interior, there is a small room to the right near the start in which you can find a corpse of the previous owner. She won't be needing that key anymore. 
[url=https://i.imgur.com/A40Bdto.jpg]Screenshot of the key location[/url]

Q: Why is the file size so large? 
A: Simple. It has all the textures and meshes that aren't included in the base game.

Q: My FPS drops when I enter the estate exterior/interior?
A: Yes, this is a quite resource heavy player house mod, so you can expect that in some cases. To compensate, you could try: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50214/?]Skyrim Speed and Stability Guide[/url].

Q: I found a bug! 
A: Please report it here by sending a PM or in the posts section. (I may not answer)

Q: Any planned updates?
A: Yes. I have planned to make some NPCs populate the estate, that is why there is a ship and and guest quarters anyway. This might take some time though because Fallout 4 is at the door. :)

Q: I like the mod. What can I do for you?
A: Endorse :) And don't forget to tell your friends!

Q: How to install?
A: Download via NMM link and enable in NMM/MO or drop BSA and ESP in skyrim/data folder.

Q: Is it lore-friendly?
A: Not really. But I've tried to remain lore-friendly as I've made the mod though.

Q: Does it remove The Lady Stone or something else?
A: No. Only nav-mesh has been re-adjusted for the mod.

--[b][u]CHANGELOG[/u][/b]--
[u]v2.01[/u]
- Fixed some bad item placements
- Removed unused meshes and textures from bsa
- Fixed merchant ship
- Other small bug fixes
[/size]
author: lati100
